channel.title: Java help needed
channel.description:
OK, I've recently bought a VPS and now have the DeltaScape source files on it.
The problem is when I press run.bat, it comes up with the following message;
[code]'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file.[/code]
Figured out it all came down to, annoyingly, to a corrupt jdk file. I've now deleted it and i'm going to install jdk again.
Thanks - RuneX.

reguards
